item.title: Hosted Voice Goes Mobile
item.description: A significant shift is happening in the business world: companies are ditching their traditional PBX phone systems for cloud-based communication solutions like hosted PBX or hosted VoIP. This transition also incorporates mobile devices. For example, Megapath’s Hosted Voice Mobile allows you to make and receive calls using a single number across multiple devices â€“ desk phone, computer, and smartphone. Having one consistent number simplifies communication and avoids confusing clients with a business card full of numbers.
